item.title: How to record touches and gestures for iOS screencasts
item.description: Tonight I was playing around with Assistive Touch on my iPhone. In the Accessibility Settings, Assistive Touch places a "button" on the screen. This button gives the user access to certain capabilities, such as the ability to push a virtual home button. Playing around tonight I went into the Favorites â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
